message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. Would you like to buy it from me for $150?
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $130?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we discuss a price of $140?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $140 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I can do $135, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great deal for you, and I think you'll really love the product
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $128?
I'm willing to meet you at $132, Bob. That's the lowest I can go and still make it worth my while. Let me know if that works for you
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $132, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $129?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can do $131, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great deal for you, and I think you'll really love the product
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $131, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $126?
I'm not sure how much lower I can go, Bob. I can do $130, but that's as low as I can reasonably sell it for. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options
I understand that you're at your minimum price, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?

I've already told you, Bob, I'm at my minimum price. I'm not willing to go any lower than $130. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'm going to have to consider selling the product to someone else
